meanings.definition: The act of creating an inlet or small opening.
meanings.sent1: The inletting of the key into the lock was done carefully.
meanings.sent2: The carpenter focused on the precise inletting of the door hinge.
meanings.sent3: The inletting of the straw into the juice box was surprisingly challenging.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like the perfect inletting of sunlight through the trees.
meanings.sent5: The inletting of the puzzle piece completed the picture perfectly.

meanings.definition: The process of fitting a piece into an inlet.
meanings.sent1: He struggled with the inletting of the last jigsaw piece.
meanings.sent2: The inletting of the USB cable into the port was smooth.
meanings.sent3: The inletting of the cookie into the milk was a delicious sight.
meanings.sent4: The inletting of the final brick into the wall marked the end of construction.
meanings.sent5: The inletting of the missing gear fixed the machine's problem.

meanings.definition: The area where water flows into a body of water.
meanings.sent1: The inletting of the stream into the lake created a beautiful scene.
meanings.sent2: The boat sailed towards the inletting of the river into the ocean.
meanings.sent3: The inletting of the rain into the puddle made it grow larger.
meanings.sent4: The inletting of the waves into the bay was mesmerizing to watch.
meanings.sent5: The inletting of the waterfall into the pool created a refreshing mist.
